33030.affected_area: Alberta, Moosejaw and Swift Current Area
live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
33030.summary: Some customers in Alberta, Moosejaw and Swift Current Area are experiencing a Black Screen or Subscription Message on channels. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
33030.title: Feb 5 –  Alberta, Moosejaw and Swift Current Area| Black Screen or Subscription Message - Outage (Fix in Progress)
